summary: This is a court notification from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Epstein. It records the filing of a Notice of Appearance for additional counsel representing Jeffrey Epstein, with electronic service to his attorneys.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal appeal case United States v. Epstein, for whom additional counsel is filing an appearance.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: An attorney of record for Jeffrey Epstein who is electronically mailed this court notice.

persons.name: Donnell G. Bolden
persons.context: A deputy clerk at the Second Circuit Court of Appeals; the notice is stored in his notice cart and he is also electronically mailed the notice.

persons.name: Martin G. Weinberg
persons.context: An attorney of record for Jeffrey Epstein who is electronically mailed this court notice.

connections.description: Weingarten is listed as an attorney of record receiving notice for the appellant, Jeffrey Epstein.
Weinberg is listed as an attorney of record receiving notice for the appellant, Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Filing of Notice of Appearance for Additional Counsel
events.description: A Notice of Appearance as Additional Counsel for appellant Jeffrey Epstein is filed with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals in case 19-2221.

keyFacts: The document is a docket activity notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for case 19-2221, United States v. Epstein.
It records the filing of a 'NOTICE OF APPEARANCE AS ADDITIONAL COUNSEL' on behalf of appellant Jeffrey Epstein on August 5, 2019.
The notice was electronically served to Epstein's attorneys of record: Reid Weingarten and Martin G. Weinberg.
The case was active in the appellate court system as of August 2019, shortly before Epstein's death.
